NoTestCases=raw_input()
No_test=int(NoTestCases)
while(No_test):
    First_Input=raw_input()
    #first_input is N C
    array_first_input=First_Input.split()
    No_Elephants=int(array_first_input[0])
    
    No_Candies=int(array_first_input[1])
    Second_Input=raw_input()
    array_second_input=Second_Input.split()
    Total_required_candies=0
    for i in range(0,No_Elephants):
    	Total_required_candies+=int(array_second_input[i])
    if(Total_required_candies>No_Candies):
    	print("No")
    else:
    	print("Yes")

    No_test-=1
